briefTitle: Drain Placement for Seroma Prevention After Mammosite/SAVI Catheter Removal
officialTitle: Drain Placement for Seroma Prevention After Mammosite/SAVI Catheter Removal
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* diagnosis of breast cancer
* received accelerated partial breast irradiation

Exclusion Criteria:

* any metastatic breast cancer
* infection
* skin with radiation injury
